comment.author: 92376293@N04
comment._content: This photo is great. Do you know which town it was taken in?

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your interest!  It is probably either Russian Mission or Marshall.  The Mennonite Church administered a voluntary service program in Russian Mission from the mid 1950s to 1961, and the missionaries who led that program were affiliated with a congregation in Marshall from 1952 to 1957.
